'im=lo<MUN>' tiW/.@m@`<PAZ>w* w@'im=lo'<TLP> tAW/ׂi<AZL>ymw* `al=le<GER>b lAte<DAR>t k*Ab<MUN>wod liW/.@mi<RBM>y 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>wot w@W/.il*ax@t*i<MEH>y bAkEm<PAS> 'Et=ham*@'erA<ZQP>h w@'A<SIL>rwoti<TIP>y 'Et=b*ir@k<SIL>woteykE<ATN>m w@gam<PAS> 'A<SIL>rwoti<ZQP>yhA k*i<MER>y 'e<SIL>yn@kE<TIP>m W/ׂAmi<MER>ym `al=le<SIL>b:
hin@ni<AZL>y go`e<MEH>r lAkEm<PAS> 'Et=haz*E<ZQP>ra` w@zeri<MEH>ytiy pE<AZL>rEW/.<PAS> `al=p*@neykE<ZQP>m p*E<TIP>rEW/. xag*eykE<ATN>m w@nAW/ׂA<MER>' 'Et@kE<TIP>m 'elA<SIL>yw:
wi<SIL>yda`@t*E<ZQM>m k*i<YET>y W/.il*a<MUN>x@t*iy '<HPA>leykE<ZQP>m 'e<TIP>t ham*iY@wA<MUN>h haz*o<ATN>'t li<SIL>h@y<MEH>wot b*@riytiy<PAS> 'Et=lewi<ZQP>y 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
b*@riyti<MUN>y | hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h 'it*<RBM>wo ha<SIL>xay*iym<PAS> w@haW/*.Al<ZQP>wom wA'Et*@ne<SIL>m=l<MER>wo mworA<TIP>' way*i<SIL>yrA'e<ATN>niy w*mip*@ne<MER>y W/.@mi<TIP>y nixa<MER>t h<SIL>w*':

t*wora<MEH>t '<HSE>mEt<PAS> hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h b*@pi<ZQP>yhw* w@`aw@lA<TIP>h lo<SIL>'=nim@YA<MUN>' biW/ׂ@pAtA<ATN>yw b*@W/.Al<MEH>wom w*b@miyW/.wor<PAS> hAla<MUN>k@ 'it*i<ZQP>y w@rab*i<TIP>ym heW/.i<MER>yb me<SIL>`Aw<SIL>͏on:
k*i<SIL>y=W/ׂip@te<MEH>y kohen<PAS> yiW/.@m@rw*=da<ZQP>`at w@tworA<TIP>h y@baq@W/.<MUN>w* mip*i<ATN>yhw* k*i<TEB>y mal@'a<MER>k@ y@h<SIL>wAh=Y@bA'<TIP>wot h<SIL>w*':
w@'at*Em<PAS> sar@t*E<MUN>m min=had*E<ZQP>rEk@ hik@W/.al@t*E<MER>m rab*i<TIP>ym b*at*worA<ATN>h W/.i<SIL>xat*Em<PAS> b*@ri<MUN>yt hal*ewi<ZQP>y 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:

w@gam='<HPA>ni<GAR>y nAta<DAR>t*iy 'Et@kE<TEB>m nib@zi<MER>ym w*W/.@pAli<TIP>ym l@kAl=hA`A<ATN>m k*@pi<RBM>y '<HPA>W/.E<MEH>r 'e<SIL>yn@kEm<PAS> W/.o<SIL>m@ri<MUN>ym 'Et=d*@rAka<ZQP>y w@no<SIL>W/ׂ@'i<MER>ym p*Ani<TIP>ym b*at*worA<SIL>h:

w@lo<SIL>'='ExA<MUN>d `AW/ׂA<RBM>h w*W/.@'A<MER>r r<AZL>w*xa<PAS> l<ZQP>wo w*mAh<PAS> hA<SIL>'ExA<ZQP>d m@baq*e<TIP>W/. zE<MUN>ra` '<HSE>lohi<ATN>ym w@niW/.@mar@t*Em<PAS> b*@r<MUN>w*x<HPA>kE<ZQP>m w*b@'e<MER>W/.Et n@`w*rE<TIP>ykA 'al=yib@g*o<SIL>d:

k*i<SIL>y=W/ׂAne<MUN>' W/.al*a<RBM>x 'Ama<MEH>r y@hwAh<PAS> '<HSE>lohe<MUN>y yiW/ׂ@rA'e<ZQP>l w@kis*A<MEH>h xAmAs<PAS> `al=l@bw*W/.<ZQP>wo 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>wot w@niW/.@mar@t*E<MER>m b*@r<SIL>w*x<HPA>kE<TIP>m w@lo<MER>' tib@g*o<SIL>dw*:

h<SIL>woga`@t*E<MEH>m y@hwAh<PAS> b*@dib@reykE<ZQP>m wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*A<MUN>h hwogA<ATN>`@nw* b*E<SIL>'<HSE>mAr@kE<RBM>m k*Al=`o<AZL>W/ׂeh rA<GER>` T<MUN>wob | b*@`eyne<MUN>y y@hwA<RBM>h w*bAhEm<PAS> h<MUN>w*' xApe<ZQP>Y '<MER>wo 'ay*e<TIP>h '<HSE>lohe<MER>y ham*iW/.@p*A<SIL>T:

hin@ni<MEH>y W/.ole<AZL>xa<PAS> mal@'Aki<ZQP>y w*pin*Ah=dE<TIP>rEk@ l@pAnA<ATN>y w*pit@'om<TLP> yAb<AZL>wo' 'El=he<SIL>ykAl<GER>wo hA<SIL>'Ad<MUN>won | '<HPA>W/.Er='at*E<MUN>m m@baq@W/.i<RBM>ym w*mal@'a<AZL>k@ hab*@ri<GER>yt '<HPA>W/.Er='at*E<MEH>m x<HPA>peYiym<PAS> hin*eh=bA<ZQP>' 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
w*mi<MEH>y m@kal@k*el<PAS> 'Et=y<MUN>wom b*wo'<ZQP>wo w*mi<MER>y hA<SIL>`ome<TIP>d b*@herA<SIL>'wot<ATN>wo k*iy=hw*'<PAS> k*@'e<MUN>W/. m@YAre<ZQP>p w*k@bori<TIP>yt m@kab*@si<SIL>ym:

w@yAW/.a<AZL>b m@YAre<MEH>p w*m@Taher<PAS> k*E<ZQP>sEp w@Tiha<MEH>r 'Et=b*@ne<SIL>y=lewiy<PAS> w@ziq*a<MUN>q 'otA<ZQP>m k*az*AhA<TIP>b w@kak*A<ATN>sEp w@hAyw*<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h mag*iyW/.e<MER>y min@xA<TIP>h b*iY@dAqA<SIL>h:
w@`A<SIL>r@bAh<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h min@xa<MER>t y@hw*dA<TIP>h wiyr<SIL>w*W/.AlA<ATN>im k*iyme<MUN>y `wolA<ZQP>m w*k@W/.Ani<TIP>ym qad@mo<SIL>niy*o<SIL>t:

w@qA<SIL>rab@t*i<MUN>y '<HPA>leykEm<ZIN> lam*iW/.@p*AT<AST> w@hAyi<MUN>ytiy | `e<MUN>d m@mahe<RBM>r b*a<SIL>m@kaW/*.@piym<PAS> w*bam@nA<MUN>'<HPA>pi<ZQP>ym w*ban*iW/.@b*A`i<TIP>ym laW/*.A<ATN>qEr w*b@`o<SIL>W/.@qe<MUN>y W/ׂ@kar=W/ׂA<TLM>kiyr 'al@mAnA<AZL>h w@yAt<MEH>wom w*maT*ey=ger<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' y@re'<ZQP>w*niy 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
k*i<TEB>y '<HPA>ni<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h lo<MUN>' W/.Ani<ATN>ytiy w@'at*E<MER>m b*@ne<SIL>y=ya`<HPA>qo<TIP>b lo<MER>' k@liytE<SIL>m:

l@miyme<AZL>y '<HPA>bo<SIL>teykE<GER>m sar@t*E<MEH>m me<SIL>xuq*ay<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' W/.@mar@t*E<ZQP>m W/.<MEH>w*bw* 'elay<PAS> w@'AW/.<MUN>w*bAh '<HPA>leykE<ZQP>m 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>wot wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*E<MER>h nAW/.<SIL>w*b:

hAbi<AZL>y'w* 'Et=k*Al=ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>W/ׂe<GER>r 'El=b*e<MUN>yt hA<SIL>'woYA<RBM>r wiyhi<MER>y TE<AZL>rEp<PAS> b*@beyti<ZQP>y w*b@xAn<MEH>w*niy nA'<PAS> b*Azo<ZQP>'t 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>wot 'im=lo<DAR>' 'Ep@t*a<MUN>x lAkE<RBM>m 'e<YET>t '<HPA>rub*<MUN>wot haW/*.Ama<ZQP>yim wah<HPA>ri<SIL>yqoti<MER>y lAkE<TEB>m b*@rAkA<TIP>h `ad=b*@liy=dA<SIL>y:

w@'iW/*.@r<MER>w* 'Et@kE<TIP>m k*Al=hag*woyi<ATN>m k*i<SIL>y=tih@y<MEH>w* 'at*Em<PAS> 'E<MUN>rEY xe<ZQP>pEY 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
xA<SIL>z@q<MER>w* `Ala<TEB>y d*ib@reykE<TIP>m 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ATN>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<ZQM>m mah=n*id@b*a<TIP>r@nw* `AlE<SIL>ykA:

w@`at*A<ZQM>h '<HPA>na<TIP>x@nw* m@'aW/*.@ri<MUN>ym zedi<ATN>ym g*am=nib@nw*<PAS> `oW/ׂe<MUN>y riW/.@`A<ZQP>h g*a<DAR>m b*A<SIL>x<HPA>n<TEB>w* '<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym way*im*Ale<SIL>Tw*:

'A<DAR>z nid@b*@r<TEB>w* yir@'e<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h 'i<MUN>yW/. 'El=re`e<ATN>hw* way*aq@W/.e<MEH>b y@hwAh<PAS> way*iW/.@mA<ZQP>` wa<TLM>y*ik*Ateb se<MUN>pEr zik*Ar<MEH>won l@pAnAyw<PAS> l@yir@'e<MUN>y y@hwA<ZQP>h w*l@xo<SIL>W/.@be<TIP>y W/.@m<SIL>wo:

w@W/.ab@t*Em<PAS> w*r@'iytE<ZQP>m b*e<MER>yn Yad*i<TIP>yq l@rAW/.A<ATN>` b*e<YET>yn `obe<MUN>d '<HSE>lohi<ZQP>ym la<SIL>'<HPA>W/.E<TIP>r lo<MER>' `<HPA>bAd<SIL>wo:

k*i<SIL>y=hin*e<MEH>h hay*wom<PAS> b*A<ZQP>' b*o`e<TIP>r k*at*an*<ATN>w*r w@hAy<AZL>w* kAl=zedi<GER>ym w@kAl=`oW/ׂe<MEH>h riW/.@`Ah<PAS> qa<ZQP>W/. w@liha<AZL>T 'otA<GER>m hay*<MUN>wom hab*A<RBM>' 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>wot '<HPA>W/.E<TEB>r lo<SIL>'=ya`<HPA>zo<MER>b lAhE<TIP>m W/.o<MER>rEW/. w@`AnA<SIL>p:
w@zA<SIL>r@xA<AZL>h lAkE<GER>m yir@'e<MEH>y W/.@miy<PAS> W/.E<MUN>mEW/. Y@dAqA<ZQP>h w*mar@p*e<TIP>' b*ik@nApE<ATN>yhA wi<SIL>yYA'tE<MER>m w*piW/.@t*E<TIP>m k*@`Eg@le<MER>y mar@b*e<SIL>q:

w@`as*wotE<MUN>m r@W/.A`i<ZQP>ym k*i<SIL>y=yih@y<MUN>w* 'e<ZQP>pEr t*a<TIP>xat k*ap*<MUN>wot rag@leykE<ATN>m b*ay*wom<PAS> '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r '<HPA>ni<MUN>y `oW/ׂE<ZQP>h 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
zik@r<ZQM>w* t*wora<TIP>t moW/.E<MUN>h `ab@d*i<ATN>y '<HPA>W/.Er<TLP> Yiw*i<AZL>ytiy 'wot<MEH>wo b@xoreb<PAS> `al=k*Al=yiW/ׂ@rA'e<ZQP>l xuq*i<TIP>ym w*miW/.@p*ATi<SIL>ym:
hin*e<MEH>h 'A<SIL>nokiy<PAS> W/.ole<MUN>xa lAkE<ZQP>m 'e<TIP>t 'e<SIL>liy*A<MUN>h han*Abi<ATN>y' lip@ne<RBM>y b*<YET>wo' y<MUN>wom y@hwA<ZQP>h hag*Ad<TIP>wol w@han*worA<SIL>':
w@heW/.i<MEH>yb leb='Abwot<PAS> `al=b*Ani<ZQP>ym w@le<MER>b b*Ani<TIP>ym `al='<HPA>bwotA<ATN>m p*En='Ab<ZQM>wo' w@hik*eyti<MER>y 'Et=hA'A<TIP>rEY xe<SIL>rEm:
maW/*ׂA<MER>' d@bar=y@hwA<TIP>h 'El=yiW/ׂ@rA'e<ATN>l b*@ya<TIP>d mal@'Aki<SIL>y:

'Aha<MEH>b@t*iy 'Et@kEm<PAS> 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ZQP>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*A<MUN>h '<HPA>hab@t*A<ATN>nw* h<HPA>lwo'='A<AZL>x `eW/ׂA<MEH>w l@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qob<PAS> n@'um=y@hwA<ZQP>h wA<SIL>'oha<TIP>b 'E<SIL>t=ya`<HPA>qo<SIL>b:
w@'Et=`eW/ׂA<TIP>w W/ׂAne<ATN>'tiy wA<SIL>'AW/ׂi<MEH>ym 'Et=hArAyw<PAS> W/.@mAmA<ZQP>h w@'Et=na<SIL>x<HPA>lAt<TIP>wo l@tan*<MER>wot mid@b*A<SIL>r:

k*i<SIL>y=to'ma<AZL>r '<HSE>d<GER>wom ruW/*.a<RBM>W/.@nw* w@nAW/.w*b<PAS> w@nib@nE<MUN>h x<HQA>rAb<ZQP>wot k*o<MEH>h 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>wot he<MER>m*Ah yib@n<TIP>w* wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MUN>y 'E<SIL>h<HSE>r<ATN>wos w@qA<SIL>r@'<MEH>w* lAhEm<PAS> g*@b<MUN>w*l riW/.@`A<ZQP>h w@hA`A<TEB>m '<HPA>W/.Er=zA`a<MER>m y@hwA<TIP>h `ad=`wolA<SIL>m:
w@`e<SIL>yneykE<TIP>m t*ir@'E<ATN>ynAh w@'at*E<MEH>m t*o<SIL>'m@rw*<PAS> yig@d*a<MUN>l y@hwA<ZQP>h me`a<TIP>l lig@b<MER>w*l yiW/ׂ@rA'e<SIL>l:

b*e<TEB>n y@kab*e<MER>d 'A<TIP>b w@`E<MUN>bEd '<HPA>donA<ATN>yw w@'im='A<MUN>b 'A<MUN>niy 'ay*e<MUN>h k@bwodi<PAZ>y w@'im='<HPA>dwoni<MUN>ym 'Aniy<TLP> 'ay*e<AZL>h m<SIL>worA'i<GER>y 'Ama<MUN>r | y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<RBM>wot lAkEm<PAS> hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>niym<PAS> b*woze<MUN>y W/.@mi<ZQP>y wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<ZQM>m b*am*E<MER>h bAzi<TIP>ynw* 'Et=W/.@mE<SIL>kA:

mag*iyW/.i<MEH>ym `a<SIL>l=miz@b*@xiy<PAS> lE<MUN>xEm m@go'A<ZQP>l wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*E<MUN>h ge<SIL>'al@n<ATN>w*kA b*E<SIL>'<HSE>mAr@kE<ZQM>m W/.ul@xa<MER>n y@hwA<TIP>h nib@zE<MER>h h<SIL>w*':

w@ki<SIL>y=tag*iyW/.<AZL>w*n `iw*e<MEH>r liz@b*o<AZL>xa<PAS> 'e<MUN>yn rA<ZQP>` w@ki<MER>y tag*i<TEB>yW/.w* p*is*e<MER>xa w@xolE<TIP>h 'e<MUN>yn rA<ATN>` haq@riybe<AZL>hw* nA<GER>' l@pE<SIL>xAtE<RBM>kA h<HPA>yir@Y@kA<PAS> '<YET>wo h<HPA>yiW/*ׂA<MUN>' pAnE<ZQP>ykA 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>wot:
